001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Visitor;
004
005/**
006 * A visitor interface for traversing a {@link NeuralNetwork}.
007 *
008 * <p>This interface follows the <em>Visitor Pattern</em>, allowing clients to
009 * perform operations on neurons, layers, and connections without modifying the
010 * network structure. Implementations can override any of the default methods
011 * to handle specific events during traversal.
012 *
013 * <p>All methods have default empty implementations, so you can override only
014 * the methods you need.
015 *
016 * @see NeuralNetwork
017 * @see Neuron
018 */
019@Visitor
020public interface NeuronVisitor {
021
022    /**
023     * Called when entering the entire network before any layers or neurons
024     * are visited.
025     *
026     * @param neuralNetwork the neural network being traversed
027     */
028    default void enterNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork) {
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * Called after all layers and neurons have been visited in the network.
033     *
034     * @param neuralNetwork the neural network that was traversed
035     */
036    default void exitNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork) {
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Called when entering a specific layer in the network.
041     *
042     * @param neuralNetwork the neural network being traversed
043     * @param layerIndex    the index of the layer being entered
044     */
045    default void enterLayer(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, int layerIndex) {
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Called after all neurons in a specific layer have been visited.
050     *
051     * @param neuralNetwork the neural network being traversed
052     * @param layerIndex    the index of the layer being exited
053     */
054    default void exitLayer(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, int layerIndex) {
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Called when visiting a single neuron in a specific layer.
059     *
060     * @param neuralNetwork the neural network being traversed
061     * @param neuron        the neuron being visited
062     * @param layerIndex    the index of the layer containing the neuron
063     * @param neuronIndex   the index of the neuron within its layer
064     */
065    default void visitNeuron(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron, int layerIndex, int neuronIndex) {
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Called when visiting a connection (synapse) between two neurons.
070     *
071     * @param neuralNetwork the neural network being traversed
072     * @param source        the source neuron of the connection
073     * @param fromLayer     the layer index of the source neuron
074     * @param fromIndex     the index of the source neuron within its layer
075     * @param target        the target neuron of the connection
076     * @param toLayer       the layer index of the target neuron
077     * @param toIndex       the index of the target neuron within its layer
078     * @param weight        the weight of the connection
079     */
080    default void visitConnection(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron source, int fromLayer, int fromIndex,
081                                 Neuron target, int toLayer, int toIndex, float weight) {
082    }
083
084}
